title: Irv Gotti Interview and More
itunes:title: Irv Gotti Interview and More
description:
Today on the show we had Irv Gotti call in, and you already know he came with some good stories to tell about Murder inc. and so much more. Moreover, after John Legend called out realtors and housing discrimination we opened up the phone lines to see if any of our listeners dealt with racism while trying to rent or buy a place. Also, since Charlamagne is still on vacation we had the listeners call up so they can nominate someone for "Donkey of the Day"

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Today on the show we had Irv Gotti call in, and you already know he came with some good stories to tell about Murder inc. and so much more. Moreover, after John Legend called out realtors and housing discrimination we opened up the phone lines to see if any of our listeners dealt with racism while trying to rent or buy a place. Also, since Charlamagne is still on vacation we had the listeners call up so they can nominate someone for "Donkey of the Day"
